attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Date value selected by the date selector. You can set the initial value of the selector.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: editable
attrs.desc: The text box can be entered.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: clearable
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Text box size; The values of this attribute are medium, small, and mini

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is null.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Class name of the TimePicker drop-down list box

attrs.name: picker-options
attrs.desc: The following table lists the options of the current time and date selector.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {}.

attrs.name: default-value
attrs.desc: Optional. When the selected date is empty, the time displayed by default when the selector panel is opened. Set it to a value that can be parsed by new Date().

attrs.name: suffix-icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is IconCalendar.

attrs.name: clear-icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is IconOperationfailed.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert a pop-up box to the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the fault in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the user confirms the selected value.

events.name: blur
events.desc: This event is triggered when the input loses focus.

events.name: focus
events.desc: This event is triggered when the input is focused.
